Class Mask

All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessible, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.FormComponent, HotComponent, ImageObserver, MaskComponent, MenuContainer, Serializable
public abstract class Mask
extends Form
implements MaskComponent

A specialization of Form that extracts a list of components from a configuration file entry and places them into the superclass.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

register

public void register(HotComponent.Arbiter arbiter)
Description copied from interface: HotComponent
Called by the HotStation upon registration to establish the kinds of data your component is available to give and take. See the Arbiter for more information.

Specified by:
register in interface HotComponent

pick

public boolean pick(boolean b)
Description copied from interface: HotComponent
Called by the HotStation when the user hot-selects your component, with a flag specifying whether this is a select or de-select. In the case of a select, you may deny the selection by returning false. The return value in the case of a de-select is ignored. Upon agreed select, you are expected to highlight your component with the current hot color (passed to you at registration time via setHotColor(Color)), so that the user can see what has been selected. If your component gives a wide variety of hot data, you might also make a visual note of exactly what kind of data is being currently offered (it may change as the HotStation calls give(Class, int) with the operation SAMPLE).

Specified by:
pick in interface HotComponent
Parameters:
b - specifies select (true) or de-select (false)

give

public Object give(Class type,
                   int operation)
Description copied from interface: HotComponent
Called by the HotStation to get an instance of your hot data. The operation specifies the context in which the request is being made of you; it will be one of SAMPLE, MOVE, COPY and LINK. See those constants for more information. The type specifies the kind of data the arbiter deems most appropriate for the current context.

Specified by:
give in interface HotComponent
Parameters:
type - the type of data the HotStation is currently interested to obtain from you. This will be one of the types you registered with the Arbiter in your register(Arbiter) method.
operation - one of SAMPLE, MOVE, COPY and LINK; see those constants for more information.
Returns:
the data requested by the HotStation

isCompatible

public boolean isCompatible(Object hot)
Description copied from interface: HotComponent
Called by the HotStation to find out whether the object hot can be dropped on your component. Return your opinion.

Specified by:
isCompatible in interface HotComponent
Parameters:
hot - the potential delivery
Returns:
your choice, do you want the object hot or not

take

public void take(Object hot)
Description copied from interface: HotComponent
Called by the HotStation when the user has chosen to hot drop the object hot onto your component. If a COPY operation has been specified, the giving component will have already performed the copy. You may simply take what's here and apply it in the manner of your component.

Specified by:
take in interface HotComponent
Parameters:
hot - the delivery
